attributes.action: Finningley and Torne Valley Children's Centre
attributes.additional_details:
We are against the closure of Finningley and Torne Valley Children's Centre, Hayfield Lane.
Auckley..

This centre has made a huge difference to our area and the area it covers, it has and is continuing to support many families and also helping many children with activities and the odd trip that families mightn't be able to do without the centre.
